references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational model for the current state-of-the-art diffusion models discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of the design space of diffusion models, which is highly relevant to the research on accelerating diffusion model generation.

references.paper_title: Improved distribution matching distillation for fast image synthesis
references.reason: This paper proposes an improved distribution matching distillation method for accelerating image generation, which serves as a critical baseline for the proposed approach in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Prolificdreamer: High-fidelity and diverse text-to-3D generation with variational score distillation
references.reason: This paper introduces a variational score distillation method for text-to-3D generation, providing a related technique to the proposed f-divergence approach.

references.paper_title: Generative modeling by estimating gradients of the data distribution
references.reason: This paper introduces score matching, a fundamental concept and technique used in diffusion models which is crucial for the target paper's research.
